column1: 38945,Fear Itself: Wolverine (2011) #2,2,25268,87,FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! What else is there to fear but FEAR ITSELF? A nuclear-bomb-equipped Hellicarrier stolen by a terrorist sleeper cell and docked over New York City is probably a good candidate. Wolverine and Melita race against the clock to shut down STRIKE before STRIKE takes out half of the city!  ,
